sentences.en: A faint perfume of jasmine came through the window.
sentences.cn: 从窗户外飘进一阵淡淡的茉莉花香.

sentences.en: A Let's have some jasmine tea . That'll be good for you.
sentences.cn: A我们来喝点茉莉花茶. 它对你比较好.

sentences.en: Do you prefer black tea, jasmine tea, or coffee?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢红茶, 茉莉花茶还是咖啡?

sentences.en: Earl Grey, Darjeeling and Jasmine are best-selling traditional teas.
sentences.cn: 伯爵茶、大吉岭茶和茉莉花茶是最畅销的几种传统茶叶。

sentences.en: Geranium , Carrot Seeed, Jasmine , Evening Primrose, Grapeseed and so on.
sentences.cn: 天竺葵 、 葫萝卜籽、葡萄籽 、 茉莉、月见草等.

sentences.en: He said that the leaves of his jasmine plant had turned yellow.
sentences.cn: 他说他的茉莉花的叶子变黄了.
空气中弥漫着茉莉花香。

sentences.en: Jasmine, Saving Face and Sunflower will be released in 2005.
sentences.cn: 《茉莉花开》、《面子》以及《向日葵》将于2005年发行放映.

sentences.en: Oh, it's a kind of green tea with the smell of jasmine.
sentences.cn: 嗯, 这是一种带有茉莉花香的绿茶.

sentences.en: Table cloths with jasmine patterns are very popular in the market.
sentences.cn: 印有茉莉花图案的桌布在市面上很抢手.

sentences.en: The jasmine flower is a beautiful flowers in the world.
sentences.cn: 茉莉花是世界上很美丽的花.

sentences.en: The jasmine sighed, " Alas , " and dropped to the ground.
sentences.cn: 茉莉花 叹息了一声, 落在地上了.

sentences.en: The raindrop whispered to the jasmine, " Keep me in your heart for ever. "
sentences.cn: 雨点向茉莉花微语道: “ 把我永久地留在你的心里吧. ”

sentences.en: You can smell the perfume of jasmine.
sentences.cn: 你可以闻到茉莉花的香味.

sentences.en: You should take something light, such as a jade tie - pin, jasmine tea.
sentences.cn: 你只能带些轻的东西, 比如说绿玉色领带针 、 茉莉花茶.

trans.tran_en: a plant that grows up a wall, frame etc and has small sweet-smelling white or yellow flowers
a plant that grows up a wall, frame etc and has small sweet-smelling white or yellow flowers
